about_the_game:
Caphaclus is a world that holds many secrets and lots of ruins. Nobody knows much of the past of the planet. You will play as Darwyn, the main character. You embark on an adventure to discover secret relics that have existed in the past that hold unknown powers. The problem is that another group is also after the relics. Are they collecting them for malicious purposes? You must stop those who want to do evil things with the relics and uncover the truth to the planet of Caphaclus.

Experience this very story rich RPG. Caphaclus Recommence is similar to a lot of RPGs on the market. There is a leveling system, skill trees, loot, and more. Other game mechanics include mounts to help you travels the lands quicker, and a crafting system so that you can craft items to give you a little boost.

We hope that you will join us on this epic adventure and discover the truth to Caphaclus!
